item.title: Number of Lambda-Calculus
item.description: len&fact function fact :: (Integral a) => a -> a fact 0 = 1 fact n = n * fact (n - 1) function fact(n) if n == 0 then return 1 end return n * fact(n - 1) end --------------------------- fact = function(n) if n == 0 then return 1 end return n * ???(n-1) end arr = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] -------------------------------- arr.length -------------------------------- def len(arr) if arr == [] return 0 else return 1 + len(arr[1.
